# Scottish Avalanche Forecasts: Neural Network Modelling

This website presents coursework completed in fulfillment of **STA5073Z â€“ Data Science for Industry (2025)**.  
The project uses 15 years of avalanche forecast data from the **Scottish Avalanche Information Service (SAIS)** to build and evaluate predictive neural network models. The site includes the full scientific report, a description of how we used large language models (LLMs) during the assignment, a signed plagiarism declaration, and the details of our final model.
